name: Neocube (itch) (DM Studios)
description:
This is a game developed entirely by me, Devon L. Steyn, this game will be in the list of Level One Studios games. Level One Studios is a games company that I have made, this is my second game and is much better than the game Mark and I previously uploaded. I hope you enjoy this. Thank you for the recent support on Do You Know De Wae? It really means a lot to Mark and I. I really hope you enjoy this game.

~Devon L. Steyn (CEO of Level One Studios)
